oai_dc:dc.dc:title: West End High School, c.1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of West End High School, c.1950s.The building was a project of the Public Works Administration, and it was completed in 1937. Its name was changed to West End Middle School in 1971. Designed in the Colonial Revival architectural style by Donald W. Southgate, the building was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in August of 2003. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
